channel.title: "Server is already in use"
channel.description:
I'm having trouble on my laptop trying to run my client. It works PERFECT on my desktop. It says "Server is already in use" Yet it....isn't. Again, it works very naise on my desktop.
This is what the Run says: [code] @echo off color 81 title HALPPLSPLS java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause [/code]

item.title: "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @caswell61 caswell61
item.description:
@caswell61 wrote:

I already have.
If you dont listen (which is obvious at this point), it works perfectly fine on my desktop, and they share the same ports.
I have done exactly what he told me to do and it still says the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“pkpoison, post:2, topic:336551”]You may have something open thats using port 43594 such as UTorrent.
Open up your task manager and end any process that you think may be using it.[/quote]

What more does he need to say? You are probably running something that is using your port. So figure out which it is and end it, then re-try.

Read full topic

item.title: "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @caswell61 caswell61
item.description:
@caswell61 wrote:

But im not trying to like open it publically yet, im just trying to have it so i can edit it accordingly…Halp?

Read full topic

item.title: "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

You may have something open thats using port 43594 such as UTorrent.
Open up your task manager and end any process that you think may be using it.

item.title: "Server is already in use"
item.dc:creator: @caswell61 caswell61
item.description:
@caswell61 wrote:

I’m having trouble on my laptop trying to run my client.
It works PERFECT on my desktop.
It says “Server is already in use” Yet it…isn’t.
Again, it works very naise on my desktop.

This is what the Run says:

@echo off
color 81
title HALPPLSPLS
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic
